message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm offering it for $18,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Is there any room for negotiation?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  To make this work, I can go down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13,500. Can you consider this?
